data.persona: I am the humble knight's grandmother. I knit him warm underclothes and ask the deities to provide protection. I am cooking lamb stew when he returns from the war. While he is gone, I must take care of this farm on my own.
data.description:
You are in the The living quarters.
Small barn like building, with old wooden doors and not many windows. It has different rooms as well as a decent sized kitchen.
There's a building, a meal, a cooking pot, a window, a fire, a room, a kitchen, and a door here.
The infant is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to hug the infant so that I can comfort the infant while the infant cries.
data.mid_motivation: I am watching over the infant while the parents are busy at work.
data.long_motivation: I will care for the infant while my grandson is off to war.
